description:
With a history that dates to 1927, The Steinberg Law Firm has served the injured and disabled throughout South Carolina's Lowcountry for more than 90 years. During that time, we have become the trusted advocates to those seeking their rightful benefits and compensation following a workplace accident or any other avoidable tragedy caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Our law office in Charleston is one of three we have in the region, lending testament to the level of success we have achieved. Today, our attorneys carry on our tradition of providing exceptional legal counsel and compassionate support to those dealing with complex legal challenges involving:

  • Workers' compensation
  • Personal injury
  • Construction defects
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Dangerous products
  • Premises liability
  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Dog bites
  • Head and spine injuries

Backed by an astounding 170+ years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm possess the skills and resources to help you resolve your matter and obtain the finances you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and the other expenses associated with your accident. Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards on behalf of our clients, and we promise to do whatever we can to help you assert your rights and achieve the favorable results you deserve.

For more information on how The Steinberg Law Firm can best help you and your family secure a brighter future during your difficult and uncertain time, you can contact our law office to receive a free evaluation of your claim.
